description:
Can Roon's turrets defeat the evil song of the Sirens? With Roon's entry into Azur Lane: Crosswave, the Iron Blood Nation is ready to take on any Kansen!

The Roon DLC unlocks the following:

Main Ship (Playable):
• Roon

Support Ships:
• Graf Zepplin
• Deutschland
• Admiral Graf Spee

Story Mode:
• Roon - Additional Story Mode content
name: Roon Episode
